Indian captain Virat Kohli has hit out at the "very confusing" situation regarding star batsman Rohit Sharma, who remains at home with a hamstring injury.
Rohit suffered the injury while playing in … [+2689 chars]

articles.author: Sporting News
articles.title: Tottenham 4-0 Ludogorets: Carlos Vinicius off the mark as Harry Winks nets outrageous 54-yard lob - Goal.com
articles.description: Chelsea manager Frank Lampard believes Thiago Silva's experience and leadership gives him the ability to stop Harry Kane and Son Heung-min as Tottenham travel to Stamford Bridge on Sunday.
